price: 43. This is the Hell which the Mujrimûn (polytheists, criminals, sinners) denied.
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
